property.caption: Date format
property.description: Date format that is used, e.g. mm/dd/yy or dd-mm-yy. See jQueryUI documentation (http://api.jqueryui.com/datepicker/#utility-formatDate) for possible formats.

property.caption: Default date
property.description: Optional default date to start with, should be corresponding to the date format.

property.caption: Range
property.description: Range in years, either absolute (1970:2010) or relative (-100:+0)

property.caption: Display button bar
property.description: Display a button for selecting Today's date and a Done button for closing the calendar.

property.caption: Month / year menus
property.description: Show month and year dropdowns in place of the static month/year header to facilitate navigation through large timeframes.

property.caption: Show weeknumber
property.description: Show the week of the year.

property.caption: First day of the week
property.description: Only used when weeknumber is shown. The default calculation follows the ISO 8601 definition: the week starts on Monday, the first week of the year contains the first Thursday of the year.
